programHeader.title: Digital SkillUp Africa
programHeader.description: Empowering African youth with essential digital skills for the modern workforce. Our comprehensive program covers web development, digital marketing, and entrepreneurship.

images.alt: Students learning digital skills in Africa

phases.title: Foundation Phase
phases.description: Learn the basics of digital literacy and internet navigation

phases.title: Skill Development
phases.description: Master essential digital skills for your chosen track

phases.title: Project Implementation
phases.description: Apply your skills in real-world projects

objectives.text: Bridge the digital divide across Africa

outcomes.text: Join a network of digital professionals

videoSection.title: See Digital SkillUp Africa in Action
videoSection.subtitle: Watch how we're transforming lives across Africa

ctaBanner.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Future?
ctaBanner.description: Join thousands of African youth who have already started their digital journey
